xxl.core.indexStructures
Class LinearRTreeAT

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree
          xxl.core.indexStructures.RTree
              xxl.core.indexStructures.LinearRTreeAT

public class LinearRTreeAT
extends RTree

An RTree implementing the split-strategy proposed by C.H. Ang and T.C.Tan For a detailed discussion see C.H. Ang and T.C.Tan: "New Linear Node Splitting Algorithm for R-trees", Proceedings of the 5th International Symposium on Advances in Spatial Databases 1997 Pages: 339 - 349

Nested Class Summary
 class LinearRTreeAT.Node
          A modification of node implementing the linear split-algorithm.
